column4: how do i ssh into a computer running off of the ubuntu livecd?
you probably need to install openssh (sudo apt-get install openssh) on the compy running off the live CD.

agreed, and ive already done that.  but when i try to ssh to the ip address of that comp (effectively as root), i am prompted for a password.  anybody know what the livecd username is and its password?
ah, right the password. try things such as "root" "toor" "ubuntu" "password", etc...
